verses.verse: Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was old <S%H2204><s%> [and] advanced <S%H935><s%> in years <S%H3117><s%> when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "You are old <S%H2204><s%> [and] advanced <S%H935><s%> in years, <S%H3117><s%> and very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> remains <S%H7604><s%> to be possessed. <S%H3423><s%>

"This <S%H2088><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> that remains: <S%H7604><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the regions <S%H1552><s%> [of] the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> [those of] the Geshurites; <S%H1651><s%>

from the Shihor <S%H7883><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is east <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> even as far <S%H5704><s%> as the border <S%H1366><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%> to the north <S%H6828><s%> (it is counted <S%H2803><s%> as Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>); the five <S%H2568><s%> lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines: <S%H6430><s%> the Gazite, <S%H5841><s%> the Ashdodite, <S%H796><s%> the Ashkelonite, <S%H832><s%> the Gittite, <S%H1663><s%> the Ekronite; <S%H6139><s%> and the Avvite <S%H5761><s%>

to the south, <S%H8486><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> and Mearah <S%H4632><s%> that belongs to the Sidonians, <S%H6722><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Aphek, <S%H663><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorite; <S%H567><s%>

and the land <S%H776><s%> of the Gebalite, <S%H1382><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> of Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> toward the east, <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%> from Baal-gad below <S%H8478><s%> Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Lebo-hamath.

"All <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> from Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Misrephoth-maim, all <S%H3605><s%> the Sidonians, <S%H6722><s%> I will drive <S%H3423><s%> them out from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> allot <S%H5307><s%> it to Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> as I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you.

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, apportion <S%H2505><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> land <S%H776><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes, <S%H7626><s%> and the half-tribe of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>"

With the other half-tribe, the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to the east, <S%H4217><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to them;

from Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%> with the city <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the valley, <S%H5158><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the plain <S%H4334><s%> of Medeba, <S%H4311><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Dibon; <S%H1769><s%>

and all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who <S%H834><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the border <S%H1366><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%>

and Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and the territory <S%H1366><s%> of the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%> and Maacathites, <S%H4602><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon, <S%H2768><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Bashan <S%H1316><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Salecah; <S%H5548><s%>

all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> who <S%H834><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> and in Edrei <S%H154><s%> (he alone was left <S%H7604><s%> of the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of the Rephaim <S%H7497><s%>); for Moses <S%H4872><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> them and dispossessed <S%H3423><s%> them.

But the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did not dispossess <S%H3423><s%> the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%> or the Maacathites; <S%H4602><s%> for Geshur <S%H1650><s%> and Maacath <S%H4601><s%> live <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Only <S%H7534><s%> to the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> he did not give <S%H5414><s%> an inheritance; <S%H5159><s%> the offerings <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> are their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as He spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him.
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> [an inheritance] to the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

And their territory <S%H1366><s%> was from Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%> with the city <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the plain <S%H4334><s%> by Medeba; <S%H4311><s%>
Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are on the plain: <S%H4334><s%> Dibon <S%H1769><s%> and Bamoth-baal and Beth-baal-meon,
and Jahaz <S%H3096><s%> and Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> and Mephaath, <S%H4158><s%>
and Kiriathaim <S%H7156><s%> and Sibmah <S%H7643><s%> and Zereth-shahar on the hill <S%H2022><s%> of the valley, <S%H6010><s%>
and Beth-peor and the slopes <S%H794><s%> of Pisgah <S%H6449><s%> and Beth-jeshimoth,

even all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain <S%H4334><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> who <S%H834><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> with the chiefs <S%H5387><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> Evi <S%H189><s%> and Rekem <S%H7552><s%> and Zur <S%H6698><s%> and Hur <S%H2354><s%> and Reba, <S%H7254><s%> the princes <S%H5257><s%> of Sihon, <S%H5511><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> also killed <S%H2026><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor, <S%H1160><s%> the diviner, <S%H7080><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%> among <S%H413><s%> [the rest of] their slain. <S%H2491><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> was the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> was the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> and their villages. <S%H9161><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> also gave <S%H5414><s%> [an inheritance] to the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

And their territory <S%H1366><s%> was Jazer, <S%H3270><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Aroer <S%H6177><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Rabbah; <S%H7237><s%>
and from Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Ramath-mizpeh and Betonim, <S%H993><s%> and from Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the border <S%H1366><s%> of Debir; <S%H1688><s%>

and in the valley, <S%H6010><s%> Beth-haram and Beth-nimrah and Succoth <S%H5523><s%> and Zaphon, <S%H6829><s%> the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> with the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> as a border, <S%H1366><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the [lower] end <S%H7097><s%> of the Sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to the east. <S%H4217><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> and their villages. <S%H9161><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> also gave <S%H5414><s%> [an inheritance] to the half-tribe of Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> and it was for the half-tribe of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

And their territory <S%H1366><s%> was from Mahanaim, <S%H4266><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the towns <S%H2333><s%> of Jair, <S%H2971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> cities; <S%H5892><s%>

also half <S%H2677><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> with Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> and Edrei, <S%H154><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> [were] for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> for half <S%H2677><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are [the territories] which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> apportioned <S%H5157><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> beyond <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho <S%H3405><s%> to the east. <S%H4217><s%>

But to the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> did not give <S%H5414><s%> an inheritance; <S%H5159><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> is their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as He had promised <S%H1696><s%> to them.
